string.text: Troop Enhancement Yuef
Town Money
Daily Store Supply Amount
The daily supply amount at town stores
Town Store Supply Limit
The supply limit for town stores, supplies won't be provided if it exceeds the limit
Enable Troop Recruitment Feature
Turn on/off the troop recruitment feature
Troop Recruitment Enhancement
Weekly Lord Reward Amount
Amount received by AI lords, no reward will be given if the amount exceeds 1,000,000
Minimum Recruitment Cost
Minimum cost setting, lords will not recruit troops if their current funds are below the minimum cost
Single Recruitment Cost
The cost per recruitment (the upper limit will not exceed the minimum recruitment cost)
AI Daily Troop Food Supply
Daily food supply for AI-controlled troops, supplies will not be provided if it exceeds 300
AI Maximum Civilian Troop Tier
The maximum tier of civilian troops available for AI recruitment, note that the upper limit also affects the number of troops of certain tiers
AI Maximum Noble Troop Tier
The maximum tier of noble troops available for AI recruitment, note that the upper limit also affects the number of troops of certain tiers
Civilian Troops Recruitment Amount
The total number of civilian troops that can be recruited at once
Noble Troops Recruitment Amount
The total number of noble troops that can be recruited at once
Troop Upgrade
Enable for Player
Once enabled, even when AFK, your troops will automatically level up, though the result is random
Enable for Player's Family Troops
Family troops do not include the player
Enable Auto Upgrade for Bandit Troops
When enabled, bandit troops will automatically level up
Enable Auto Upgrade for Villager Troops
When enabled, villager troops will automatically level up (if auto-upgrade for irregular troops is disabled, they will not upgrade)
Enable Auto Upgrade for Caravan Troops
When enabled, caravan troops will automatically level up
Enable Auto Upgrade for Garrison Troops
When enabled, garrison troops in cities will automatically level up
Enable Auto Upgrade for Militia
When enabled, militia (original militia without upgrade targets) will automatically level up
Enable for Player's City Garrisons and Militia
When enabled, city garrisons and militia will automatically level up (at least one of garrisons or militia must be enabled, cannot be enabled separately)
Allow Irregular Troops to Upgrade to Regular Troops
When enabled, bandits, robbers, villagers, etc., will automatically upgrade to regular troops (if possible)
Troop Upgrade Base Probability
Base probability for upgrading, with the final upgrade probability affected by tier; higher tiers have a lower probability (at 100% base, tier 8 troops have a 46.67% chance to upgrade)
